981340.name: Niplheim's Hunter - Branded Azel Demo
981340.description:
About the Demo
You can only play and explore the first area of the game.
The demo does not have all the features of the full game.

Controls
The game can only be played with a keyboard or a controller.
Mouse is not supported.
[Z] = Accept, Hold for Fast Battles
[X] = Cancel, Menu
[Ctrl] = Skip Text
[Shift] = Auto Text Mode, [X] to stop
[Q]= Hide Dialog
[W] = Text Log

Save data from the demo is NOT compatible with the full game.
If you have a non-empty Save folder in your main game folder,
please rename it. Launching the DLC (or main game) with incompatible data
in the save folder will give an error, but your save data won't be lost.

All characters are over the age of 18.
